response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. After careful consideration, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This offer takes into account its value to you at $8,000 and aims to provide a fair transaction for both parties. I look forward to your response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your experience.", "product_price": 9500}
